events.message: The insured contacted us to file a claim after their vehicle was involved in a collision on April 30th.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords relating to vehicle collision.
An agent was assigned to the case promptly to ensure quick follow-up with the claimant.
We acknowledged receipt of the claim in writing and informed the insured of the next steps.
Requested police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and repair estimates from the claimant.
The claimant provided all requested documentation including police report and mechanic inspection reports.
Investigation team began reviewing submitted documents and assessing the claim details.
Completed investigation confirming the collision was not the claimantâ€™s fault and eligible for coverage.
Proposed a settlement amount based on repair estimates and policy coverage terms.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and the speed of processing.
Officially approved the claim following acceptance of the settlement proposal by the insured.
Issued payment to the claimant to cover authorized vehicle repairs as per the claim settlement.
Closed the claim file after confirming repair works had been completed satisfactorily.
Archived the claim documentation in accordance with company record retention policies.
